content:
The court is directed to the court regarding the intelligence commander 104 of the Airborne Assault Regiment.

About thisShe reported March 6Kyiv Regional Prosecutor's Office.

The investigation found that in March 2022 the accused arrived at the checkpoint between the occupied villages of Zabuchya, Dmitrovka and Mykhailivka of the Buchan district of Kyiv region. The commander found in the phone a man detained by other servicemen, photos of Molotov cocktails and materials for checkpoints.

The unarmed man proved to the invaders that he was civil and did not pose any threat to them. Nevertheless, he was detained, placed in an armored car and taken to the forest plant.

On the order of the intelligence commander, the commander of the 2nd Branch of the Intelligence, and the deputy commander of the Sniper Platoon, who were in charge of it, were questioned for the detainee for belonging to the Armed Forces. He was beaten and imitated to death, shoting his head.

After the torture, Russian servicemen, on the orders of their leader, were killed by a civilian man and left the body in the forest plant.

In June 2023, by the decree of the President of the Russian Federation, the Assembly Commander was awarded the title of Hero of the Russian Federation. The Golden Star Medal was presented to him personally by the Minister of Defense of the aggressor country.

The involvement of the accused in the crime is confirmed by their coinner, whom the Armed Forces servicemen were captured near Kherson.

Beforehas been reportedThe suspicion of two Russian generals who bombed Borodyanka.
title: Russia's hero has been suspected of execution of civilian in Kyiv region
description: This was reported on March 6 by the Kyiv Regional Prosecutor's Office. The investigation is established, ...
author: Army Inform
